shpendkelmendi.name: Shpend Kelmendi
shpendkelmendi.title: Software Engineer & Architect
shpendkelmendi.description: Shpend Kelmendi is a Software Engineer and Cloud Architect at bbv Software Services AG. He leads the Cloud Community. His playground: Azure, DevOps, and cloud architecture. As a Microsoft Certified Trainer (MCT), he shares what he learns and helps others succeed in the cloud.

joachimjabs.name: Joachim Jabs
joachimjabs.title: Senior DevOps Engineer & Cloud Architect
joachimjabs.description: Senior DevOps Engineer & Cloud Architect at bbv Software Services AG. With a passion for cloud technologies, Joachim specializes in designing and implementing scalable solutions. He is an advocate for DevOps practices and enjoys sharing his knowledge through blogging and speaking engagements.
